data.description:
Welcome to Tennis Esports, the virtual tennis application that combines the excitement of virtual reality tennis with the competition and fun of tennis. Play with real tennis swings, and immerse yourself in the ultimate world of virtual sports from virtually anywhere.

Tennis Esports is as realistic as virtual sports gets, replicating all the spins and swings you can even enhance your experience with a VR Tennis handle! For beginner players wanting to give tennis a go, to amateur tennis fans and avid players, Tennis Esports is a fun and useful tool to learn and enjoy tennis at any level from your school, office or home! 

Build up your skills and compete in live matches, and climb the global rankings on the Tennis Esports Tour, challenge yourself with MirrorPlay©, or become addicted to the excitement of HitEmAll, our famous arcade tennis target game.

With Tennis Esports you can play in a stadium, on any surface with a small or a big space. Get fit playing running mode against our AI opponents or enable voice chat with Instant and Custom match play. Set up your own player profile and create your own virtual tennis avatar where you can see your skills, unlock prizes and represent your country!

Tennis Esports is for gamers, tennis players and sports fans of all ages. Join the Tennis Esports community on Discord to find players and keep up to date with competitions, find friends, opponents and win prizes! 
 
Download our app and join Discord! https://discord.gg/8rcSArKJD4

Dear Friends of Tennis!

We're smashing out a hot-fix update to keep your VR tennis game running smoothly!
This Update 2024.3.1 contains:

Bugfixes
Courses/Challenges: Elements did not show up when user has completed a course
UI: In some cases the Main Menu was on the wrong position
Abort Match: In some cases the cancle button was behaving wrong.


Serving up a big THANK YOU to our community!
Your Tennis Esports Team

Dear Friends of Tennis!

Prepare for unparalleled competition and entertainment as we unveil a new game mode that will transform your virtual tennis battles!
This major Update 2024.3.0 brings a whole list of new content, play modes and bugfix.

New Game Modes
Playground: Go and fully configure your own BallE workout in this new game mode.

New Features
Counting Modes: With AI Training and Custom Matches you can now use 2 more Counting Modes
Singe Set NoAd: Play one set to 6 games, after 40/40 the next point wins
Best of 3: Play a full match, first person who wins two sets wins the match
UI: You can now use the weak hand controller to navigate the menus
Instant Match: Aborted matches are now counted as retired,the retiring user loses the match

Improvement
Visual: Main environment tweaks
Performance: Lower memory footprint
Physics: optimized outgoing spin
Physics: more accurate net collision detection
Physics: more accurate court reflection

Bugfixes
Handle: Fix handle offset for Helloreal 42 for Quest 2
AI: Visually tosses the ball again
AI - Match: Match sometimes stopping after AI serve

Serving up a big THANK YOU to our community!
Your Tennis Esports Team

Dear Friends of Tennis!

Small update for lost rackets! This Patch Update 2024.2.2 brings a bugfix.

Bugfixes
Custom Offset: Ajusting the offste was still possible outside of the settings, which could cause loosing the racket.
    
Serving up a big THANK YOU to our community!
Your Tennis Esports Team

Dear Friends of Tennis!

Bringing you an ace of an update for your VR tennis extravaganza! This Patch Update 2023.12.0 brings not only small improvements but also brand new game modes. 
These are the changes you can expect:

New Game Modes
MirrorPlay AIM:  Strike different targets for points
MirrorPlay Express: Speed is key, earn more points with faster hits
MirrorPlay Training: Play without boundaries
Forehand 101: Learn basic forehand rules
Forehand Test: Evaluate your forehand, and get feedback about your performance
Add-On: Techzone Forehand Topspin (incl. new court environment)
AI Ladder mode: Play and unlock preselected opponents of our AI Squad

New Features
Social: Continue Voice Chatting after the match until the next multiplayer game
Social: Control Voice Chat in every environment
AI Squad Training: A selection of AIs to train with
Training: Introducing Training Courses (5 Courses + 30 Exercises)
Boost Levels: Introducing 3 levels which assist when hitting a ball (AI-Squad, Courses)
Visuals: Various visual and UI improvements
AIs: Add more opponents to our AI Squad

Improvement
Physics: More realistic spin and improved hit calculations

Bugfixes
Match: Double bounce on the racket during a rally leads to fault
Match Teleport: Teleport is no longer triggered when doing a fake serve
    
Serving up a big THANK YOU to our community.
